definitions.definition: lasting only for a short time; impermanent.
synonyms: here today and gone tomorrow; Moreliteraryevanescent
fugitive "our interest in the environment must not be transient"

definitions.definition: staying or working in a place for only a short time.
examples: the transient nature of the labor force in catering

definitions.definition: a person who is staying or working in a place for only a short time.
examples: hobo, vagrant, vagabond, street person, homeless person, down-and-out; Moretraveler, drifter, derelict "the plight of poor transients"Moretraveler, drifter, derelict the plight of poor transients

definitions.definition: a momentary variation in current, voltage, or frequency.
